briefTitle: Evaluate Vaccine Against Chickenpox and a Combined Vaccine Against 4 Viral Childhood Diseases: Measles, Mumps, Rubella and Chickenpox
officialTitle: Study in Healthy Children (<2 Years) to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of GSK Biologicals' Live Attenuated Varicella Vaccine (VarilrixTM) and of GSK Biologicals' Combined Measles-Mumps-Rubella-Varicella Vaccine
summary: An observer-blind study to evaluate GlaxoSmithKline Biologicals' live attenuated varicella vaccine and GlaxoSmithKline Biologicals' combined measles-mumps-rubella-varicella vaccine in the prevention of varicella disease in children. The Protocol Posting has been updated in order to comply with the FDA Amendment Act, Sep 2007.

primaryOutcome.measure: Phase A: Number of Subjects With Confirmed Varicella Case
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From 42 days post dose 2 until the end of Phase A
